dm.description: Dispersion Measure in pc/cm^3 - use mode='fixed' for constant value or mode='variable' for random range

width.description: Pulse width in ms. Use mode='array' to select from 'values', or mode='uniform' to sample between 'lower' and 'upper'.

bandwidth.description: Set mode='narrowband' to sample between lower/upper, mode='broadband' to span full band

central_frequency.description: Central frequency with offset from channel edges (actual range: lower_offset to nchan-upper_offset)

snr.description: Target Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR). For power-law, 'lower' is max SNR and 'upper' is min SNR.

scattering_measure.description: Scattering measure - use mode='fixed' for constant value or mode='variable' for random range

time_spacing.description: Initial time offset in seconds for first injection
